>
[Talismanic Sage](/Feats.aspx?ID=6423) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 217 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Talisman Dabbler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=266)

**Prerequisites**
[Talisman Dabbler Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6420)

</column>

---

Normally, affixing more than one [talisman](/Equipment.aspx?Category=15&Subcategory=19) to an item causes the talismans to be suppressed, but when you [Affix a Talisman](/Actions.aspx?ID=2632), you can specially treat one item you're working on, allowing it to have two active talismans at once. This special treatment ends if you use Affix a Talisman to treat a new item for this ability.
name: Talismanic Sage
